entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 3:52PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Significant Snow Possible Fri Night and Saturday... A cold front will move east across the North Slope Friday night and Saturday will bring mixed rain and snow. Areas above 2000 feet could have 3-6 inches of snow Friday night and Saturday.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 3:36PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Surf Friday into Saturday... Elevated surf will develop Friday and continue into Saturday. Northwest winds of 20 to 30 mph are expected Friday into Saturday causing waves to wash up near the top of the beach. Minor beach erosion may occur and belongings left on the beach could wash away.
